location_short_descr: On the southern slope of the Hradčany Hill below Prague Castle are the Palace Gardens, which are the link between Prague Castle and Mala Strana...
location_long_descr:
On the southern slope of the Hradčany Hill below Prague Castle are the Palace Gardens, which are the link between Prague Castle and Mala Strana. They consist of a total of five gardens and the Ledeburg Gardens Gallery. Currently, there is historic restoration of some of the gardens.
The complex of palace gardens under Prague Castle consists of five gardens: Ledeburská, Malá Pálffyovská, Velká Pálffyovská, Kolowratská and Malá Fürstenberská zahrada. The gardens are proud of numerous terraces, staircases , gazebos and original sculptural decoration . Almost 30 garden viewing terraces offer an unforgettable view of the Prague skyline.
